GET /accounts/{account_id}/email-securit.description: Lists, searches, and sorts an accountâ€™s email allow policies.

parameters.description: The page number of paginated results.
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: The number of results per page.
parameters.name: per_page

parameters.description: The field to sort by.
parameters.name: order

parameters.description: The sorting direction.
parameters.name: direction

parameters.description:
Allows searching in multiple properties of a record simultaneously.
This parameter is intended for human users, not automation. Its exact
behavior is intentionally left unspecified and is subject to change
in the future.
parameters.name: search

example.comments: Trust all messages send from test@example.com

is_acceptable_sender.description:
Messages from this sender will be exempted from Spam, Spoof and Bulk dispositions.
Note: This will not exempt messages with Malicious or Suspicious dispositions.

is_exempt_recipient.description: Messages to this recipient will bypass all detections.

is_trusted_sender.description: Messages from this sender will bypass all detections and link following.

verify_sender.description:
Enforce DMARC, SPF or DKIM authentication.
When on, Email Security only honors policies that pass authentication.

is_recent.description:
Select to prevent recently registered domains from triggering a
Suspicious or Malicious disposition.

is_similarity.description:
Select for partner or other approved domains that have similar
spelling to your connected domains. Prevents listed domains from
triggering a Spoof disposition.
